titlepage.titleproper: Inventory for the Espuela Land and Cattle Company Records, 1880-1979 and undated
titlepage.author: Abel Ramirez

did.head: Descriptive Summary

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: Espuela Land and Cattle Company, Ltd.

did.unittitle: Espuela Land and Cattle Company, Ltd. Records,
did.abstract: The records of the Espuela Land and Cattle Company, Ltd., a British syndicate that founded the Spur Ranch in the early 1880s.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Southwest Collection/Special Collections Library, Texas Tech University

bioghist.head: Biographical Sketch
bioghist.p: The Espuela Land and Cattle Company, Ltd., a British syndicate, founded the Spur Ranch in the early 1880s. The ranch was located in Dickens, Kent, Crosby, and Garza counties of West Texas and encompassed approximately 439,000 acres

The materials were donated by the Swenson Land and Cattle Company, owner of the Spur Ranch, and Clifford B. Jones, a former president of Texas Technological College and the son of Charles A. Jones, who was a manager for the Spur Ranch.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Included are correspondence, legal documents, financial records and work diaries. The collection bulks with financial records relating to the operation of the Spur Ranch. The correspondence includes several letters from leading ranchers, while the work diaries detail the daily routine of ranching.

controlaccess.head: Index Terms
controlaccess.p: The subject headings used by the Southwest Collection/Special Collections Library are derived from the Library of Congress and/or locally developed.

controlaccess.head: Subjects (Organizations)
controlaccess.corpname: Espuela Land and Cattle Company, Ltd.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Espuela Land and Cattle Company Records, 1880-1979 and undated, Southwest Collection/Special Collections Library, Texas Tech University, Lubbock, Texas

bibliography.head: Additional Sources
bibliography.bibref: The Handbook of Texas has published a more in-depth online biography of Espuela (Spur) Cattle Company at http://www.tsha.utexas.edu/handbook/online/search.html
Holden, William Curry. The Spur Ranch: a Study of the Inclosed Ranch Phase of the Cattle Industry in Texas. Boston: The Christopher publishing house, 1934.
Holden, William Curry. The Espuela Land and Cattle Company; a Study of a Foreign-Owned Ranch in Texas. Austin: Texas State Historical Association, 1970.
Rylander, Dorothy. The Economic Phase of the Ranching Industry on the Spur Ranch, 1885-1906. Thesis (M.A.)--Texas Technological College, 1931.

relatedmaterial.p: For related materials located in the Southwest Collection/Special Collections Library, see the following collections:
